title: Belmont-Paul Women's Equality National Monument: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners        Find out more about our partner at the Belmont-Paul Women's Equality NM NPS       The National Woman’s Party are committed to preserving the legacy of Alice Paul, founder of the NWP and author of the Equal Rights Amendment, and telling the untold stories for the benefit of scholars, current and future generations of Americans, and all the world's citizens.
